title: Research Engineer Hearing Implant Fitting (m/f) - MED-EL Medical Electronics
subtitle: Innsbruck, T 6020
body:
MED-EL is a leading manufacturer of innovative medical devices for the treatment of various types and degrees of hearing loss. Our unique portfolio of implantable hearing solutions benefits thousands of individuals in more than 100 countries worldwide. With headquarters in Innsbruck, Austria, MED-EL has over 2200 employees around the world. In support of our continuing growth, we currently have an open position with focus on:

Research Engineer Hearing Implant Fitting (m/f)

RD_SP22002
Innsbruck, Austria

Research Engineer Hearing Implant Fitting (m/f)

RD_SP22002
Innsbruck, Austria

Main Tasks

  • Develop, implement and evaluate fitting methods and machine learning models for hearing implant systems
  • Research and develop measurement setups and procedures to test and investigate fitting methods
  • Bring new fitting methods to market maturity and write relevant product specifications
  • Internal communication with other departments and external partners

Requirements

  • University degree in natural or engineering sciences, e.g. electrical engineering, physics, medical engineering, audiology etc.
  • Solid knowledge in statistics, machine learning and programming, particularly in Python and MATLAB
  • Knowledge regarding the fitting of cochlear implants and other hearing instruments, audiology and audiological tests, clinical experience in the field of audiology desired
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
  • Communicative personality, team player, independent and targeted work style

We offer

Salary will be determined based on professional experience; the formal minimum salary according to Collective Bargaining Agreement is EUR 37,022.44


We offer a challenging opportunity in a multinational work environment with English as our company language. We look forward to receiving your application at jobs.medel.com


 

Your contact:

MED-EL Medical Electronics

Headquarters

6020 Innsbruck,
